resources.string: %1$s is off. Do you want to turn this SIM card on?
%1$s is off. Do you want to turn this UIM card on?
%1$s is off. Do you want to turn this card on?
%1$s is off. Do you want to turn flight mode off and the SIM card on?
%1$s is off. Do you want to turn flight mode off and the UIM card on?
%1$s is off. Do you want to turn flight mode off and the card on?
Flight mode is on. Do you want to turn it off?
Airplane mode is on, would you like to turn it off?
The selected SIM card is locked. Please unlock.
The selected UIM card is locked. Please unlock.
The selected card is locked. Please unlock.
The selected SIM slot is locked. Please unlock.
The selected UIM slot is locked. Please unlock.
The selected slot is locked. Please unlock.
The fixed dialling numbers are enabled.
The SIM card you are about to use is roaming. No local SIM is available. Do you want to continue??
The UIM card you are about to use is roaming. No local UIM is available. Do you want to continue?
